user_query: What's the smallest house (based on square footage) that has at least 2 beds and 2 baths and was sold in Prince Edward Island between June 1, 2022 and May 15 2024 according to Zillow?

1.handles: Confirms Zillow's data availability for recently sold homes in Prince Edward Island, including details such as the number of bedrooms, bathrooms, and square footage, and ensures the data covers the specified date range.

input_vars.name: zillow_data_query
input_vars.description: Query to confirm Zillow's data availability for the specified criteria.
input_vars.value: Does Zillow provide data on recently sold homes in Prince Edward Island, including details such as the number of bedrooms, bathrooms, and square footage, and does it cover the date range of June 1, 2022, to May 15, 2024?

output_vars.name: zillow_data_availability
output_vars.description: Confirmation of Zillow's data availability for the specified criteria.

1.handles: Accesses Zillow's sold listings for Prince Edward Island and applies filters to show only homes with at least 2 beds and 2 baths.

input_vars.name: zillow_filter_query
input_vars.description: Query to access and filter Zillow's listings based on the specified criteria.
input_vars.value: Access Zillow's sold listings for Prince Edward Island and apply filters to show only homes with at least 2 beds and 2 baths.

output_vars.name: filtered_listings
output_vars.description: Filtered Zillow listings for the specified criteria.

1.handles: Sorts the filtered listings from Panel 2 by square footage in ascending order and verifies that the listings fall within the specified date range.

input_vars.name: sort_verify_query
input_vars.description: Query to sort and verify the listings based on the specified criteria.
input_vars.value: Sort the filtered listings by square footage in ascending order and verify that the listings fall within the date range of June 1, 2022, to May 15, 2024.

output_vars.name: sorted_verified_listings
output_vars.description: Sorted and verified listings for the specified criteria.

1.handles: Identifies the house with the smallest square footage that meets all criteria and cross-verifies the information with other sources.

input_vars.name: identify_cross_verify_query
input_vars.description: Query to identify and cross-verify the smallest house based on the specified criteria.
input_vars.value: Identify the house with the smallest square footage that has at least 2 beds and 2 baths and was sold in Prince Edward Island between June 1, 2022, and May 15, 2024, and cross-verify the information with other sources.

output_vars.name: smallest_house_info
output_vars.description: Information about the house with the smallest square footage that meets all criteria.
